abstract: The Starz cable channel has given the green light to a new series, "Da Vinci's Demons," which will offer an imaginary chronicle of the artist as a 25-year-old lover, dreamer and idealist.
snippet: The Starz cable channel has given the green light to a new series, "Da Vinci's Demons," which will offer an imaginary chronicle of the artist as a 25-year-old lover, dreamer and idealist.

headline.main: Hero of New Starz Series Is Leonardo da Vinci, International Man of Mystery
headline.print_headline: Decode This Twist: Leonardo on Starz
